guidanceItem.title: Remote IIS administration application is removed (\WINNT\System32\Inetsrv\IISAdmin).
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that Remote IIS administration application is removed.

How to Check

The files used for remote IIS admin is at %windir%\system32\inetsrv\iisadmin.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
